mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from SYS_ORG
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update SYS_ORG
PARENT_ORG_ID = #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REAL_ORG_ID = #{realOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_SYNC_TIME = #{sysSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SYS_ORG set PARENT_ORG_ID = #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_ORG_ID = #{realOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_LEVEL = #{realLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHORT_NAME = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_SYNC_TIME = #{sysSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
